title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 120.5 - Locations and hours for public access
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 120.5 - Locations and hours for public access

State Regulations
(a) The
following locations and/or offices of the Department of Law are hereby designated to receive requests for information under the Freedom of

Information Law: RECORDS ACCESS LOCATIONS
Albany: State of New York

Department of Law

Platform Level, Justice Building

Empire State Plaza

Albany, New York 12223

Auburn, New York 13021

(b) The records
access officers shall be: (1)
the first assistant Attorney General; (2)
the administrative director, New York State Department of Law; (3)
a special assistant Attorney General
designated for each special investigation established pursuant to statute; and
(4)
an assistant Attorney

General for the Statewide Organized Crime Task Force established pursuant to section
70-a
of the Executive Law. Requests for records pursuant to this Part received in the New York City and metropolitan area shall be referred to the first assistant Attorney

General for disposition. Requests from the upstate area shall be referred to the administrative director of the Department of Law for disposition. Requests for records of Special Investigations, including the Statewide Organized Crime Task Force, established pursuant to statute, shall be
referred to the Office of the Investigation, Attention Records Access Officer. (c) Requests
for information will be received and inspections permitted between the hours of 10 a.m. and 3 p.m., at each location on all days when such location
is open for business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
120.5

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
